articles.author: Ross Dellenger
articles.title: Hero of the day: Texas Tech backup QB Will Hammond buoys Red Raiders to dominant win over Utah - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Hammond had himself a bit of a homecoming in Salt Lake City, and Texas Tech showed that its costly roster is worth every penny in a dominant Big 12 win.
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY On Friday afternoon, as the Texas Tech team plane circled downward toward this place, Will Hammond peered out of the window.
There, thousands of feet below him, stacked on the horizon… [+5370 chars]

articles.author: Jordan  Parker
articles.title: FAA says ‘multiple failures’ in technology caused DFW, Love Field equipment outage - Dallas News
articles.description: Both airports have returned to normal operations, the FAA said.
articles.content: A ground stop and equipment outage that led to the cancellation and delay of hundreds of flights at DFW International and Love Field airports Friday evening was caused by multiple failures of technol… [+3746 chars]
